name: MicroW8 Cartridge File
summary: Learn about .UW8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Exoticorn MicroW8 is a WebAssembly-based fantasy console inspired by the TIC-80, WASM-4, and PICO-8 fantasy consoles. It is meant to run programs that are 256 bytes or smaller in size. These programs typically consist of graphical effects or simple video games.

Developers creating programs for MicroW8 save them as UW8 files. These files contain source code that was written in CurlyWas or WebAssembly and compiled to WebAssembly for use with the MicroW8 runtime.

description: A UW8 file is a MicroW8 program, meant to be run or played with the MicroW8 fantasy console. It is a binary WebAssembly file that defines the program's functions and included assets. Many UW8 files contain retro-style 8-bit video games.

instructions: You can open a UW8 file with MicroW8, which is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux, as well as on the web. Doing so will run the program the file contains (and allow you to play the game it contains, if it contains a game).

images.alt: Screenshot of a .uw8 file in MicroW8
images.caption: UW8 file open in MicroW8
